 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==plait, turn== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***period, succession*** (<span class="bdbLangGreek">περίοδος</span>)); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרִים‎</span> ***plaits*** (of hair ?) [[Song.1.10|Song 1:10]], construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרֵי זָהָב‎</span> v[[Song.1.11|Song 1:11]] ***plaits, circlets of gold***; singular ***turn***, opportunity, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּר נַעֲרָה‎</span> [[Esth.2.12|Esth 2:12]], compare v[[Esth.2.15|Esth 2:15]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺר אדם‎</span> [[1Chr.17.17|1Chr 17:17]] is corrupt, \|\| [[2Sam.7.19|2Sam 7:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת הָאָדָם‎</span>, also difficult, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרָה‎</span> **3**; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 68</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּאַר‎</span>, q. v.
